pages.title: Symbology
pages.text: Drawing symbols with a $(l:artifacts/tool/mystic_branch)Mystic Branch$(/l) allows a practitioner to sculpt natural energies.$(p)Only $(italic)Infused$() practitioners can use this type of magic.$(p)Forbidden curses require the $(italic)Infernal Infusion$()

pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: First off, start by performing a $(l:circle_magic/infusion/mysticbranch_infusion)Rite of Infusion$(/l) to combine $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#mystic_unguent)Mystic Unguent$(/l) and an $(l:resources/ent_twig)Ent Twig$(/l) to get a $(item)Mystic Branch$().$(p)To cast a spell, use and hold the Mystic Branch in the air, then wave it in a direction to draw a $(item)Symbol$(). If the symbols drawn represent the pattern of a spell, it will be casted upon release of the Mystic Branch.$(p)Left click with the branch to deflect a spell projectile.

pages.title: Boosting power
pages.text: Spell power can be boosted by binding a $(l:artifacts/statues/hobgolin_patron)Statue of Hobgoblin Patron$(/l) and getting $(l:creatures/hobgoblins)Hobgoblins$() to worship it instead of their $(l:creatures/mog)Mog$(/l) and $(l:creatures/gulg)Gulg$(/l). This worship gives the Witch more power but too many Hobgoblins may cause $(l:creatures/mog)Mog$(/l) and $(l:creatures/gulg)Gulg$(/l) to notice and attack the witch.

pages.title: Secret Spells
pages.text: Some spells are still unknown and might appear as blank pages or unreadable text. Once you find and draw the spell, their text will be revealed.$(p)Also, Some spells require a certain knowledge to be used. Dealing with $(l:creatures/imp)Flame Imps$(/l) and $(l:creatures/lord_of_torment)Lord of Torment$(/l) might shed light on the dark secrets of symbology.
